entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: SSW 31 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Freezing rain inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
